text: is a Japanese rock band. Their album inトーキョーシティ ("In Tokyo City") reached the 7th place on the Weekly Oricon Albums Chart and their single "Haikei, Tsuratsusutora" reached the 8th place on the Weekly Oricon Singles Chart. "Haikei, Tsuratsusutora" is also an ending song for the Dragon Ball Kai anime television series and their song "Hello Hello Hello" is the first ending song of the Dragon Ball Super anime television series. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Albums Chart. !Ref. |- |October 13, 2010 |空ばかり見ていた |225 | |- |July 20, 2011 |ウォールペーパーミュージックじゃ踊りたくないぜ |158 | |- |May 9, 2012 |輝く方へ |45 | |- |May 8, 2013 |未来へのスパイラル |11 | |- |October 22, 2014 |inトーキョーシティ |7 | |- |October 28, 2015 |グッドモーニングアメリカ |21 | |} ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart. !Ref. |- |January 8, 2014 |"イチ、ニッ、サンでジャンプ" |14 | |- |May 6, 2014 | |8 | |- |June 10, 2015 |"コピペ" |25 | |- |August 12, 2015 | |42 | |- |October 16, 2019 | |46 | |} ==DVDs== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon DVD Chart. !Ref. |- |January 8, 2014 |「未来へのスパイラルツアー2013」ファイナル@渋谷O-EAST 2013.10.05 |12 | |- |June 10, 2015 |「inトーキョーシティツアー2014-2015」ファイナル@Zepp Tokyo 2015.03.22 |21 | |- |March 23, 2016 |挑戦 ■七夜@日本武道館 2015.11.27 |50 | |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Japanese rock music groups
